results.name: Number of partitions of n into 2 distinct positive triangular numbers.
comment: The greedy inverse (positions of first occurrence of n) starts 0, 4, 16, 81, 471, 2031, 1381, 11781, 6906, 17956, ... - _R. J. Mathar_, Apr 28 2020
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..65536 (first 10000 terms from David A. Corneth)
results.author: _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Apr 17 2019
